product_name: Stanley Nesting Mug And Water Bottle - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Compact and portable, the Stanley Nesting Mug and Water Bottle are a great 2-in-1 solution for saving space in backpacks and cabinets. Nest the mug and water bottle together for storage or travel; separate when you're ready to hydrate. Vacuum-insulated mug keeps drinks hot for 1 hr.; holds 14 fl. oz. 18/8 stainless-steel mug won't rust; naturally BPA-free. Plastic water bottle holds 34 fl. oz. Stanley Nesting Mug and Water Bottle are fully packable together or separate. Closeout.
short_description: Compact and portable, the Stanley Nesting Mug and Water Bottle are a great 2-in-1 solution for saving space in backpacks and cabinets.
